snippet: Touchscreen chip maker Synaptics Inc reported lower-than-expected first-quarter revenue and profit, hurt by weak demand from smartphone makers, sending its shares down 13 percent in extended trading....

headline.print_headline: Synaptics Hit by Weak Demand for Touchscreen Chips for Smartphones
headline.main: Synaptics Hit by Weak Demand for Touchscreen Chips for Smartphones

lead_paragraph: Touchscreen chip maker Synaptics Inc reported lower-than-expected first-quarter revenue and profit, hurt by weak demand from smartphone makers, sending its shares down 13 percent in extended trading.
